description: From Middle English kindenesse, equivalent to kind +â€Ž -ness.

examples: Jamie's kindness is legendary, so much that people have taken advantage of her.

entries.meaning: An instance of kind or charitable behaviour.
examples: How can I thank you for your many kindnesses?
Do me a kindness and leave.
i'm going to turn a blind eye to this misdemeanour, out of the kindness of my heart.
